content: {"name": "Mending the Gap", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Please complete the Senior sign up Form https://www.mending-the-gap.org/senior-sign-up or call 404-729-5185 to receive services.\n- Only serves residents of Gweynette ,and part of Walton who have low income of 1600 a month", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mending-the-gap.org/save-our-seniors-1", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "585 Old Norcross Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Lawrenceville", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30046", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.9614892, "longitude": -84.0091601}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 729-5185", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Delivery may be available"}]}
